name: ChessTD
description:
ChessTD is a tower defense game in which you must defend the king from the enemy chess pieces that came to take him. You have a selection of card towers to stop them at your disposal.

Place your towers wisely and stop them!

Disclaimer: ChessTD is still in development Controls

Mouse only

  • Planning to add key bindings in the future
  • Not Planning to add touch/phone support
How to play

Stop the chess pieces before they reach the King at the end of the road.

  • On the top left, you have the wave you are, the lives remaining (You lose one each time a chess piece reaches the King), and your money.
  • On the bottom left, you have the play/pause button and the fast forward button to control the velocity of the game.
  • On the bottom, you have your towers, click one to select it, and then click anywhere on the map where the tooltip is green to place it. (Any placement is permanent)
